description:
Cruise to your local farmer’s market comfortably, and easily. Fully equipped with fenders, lights, and even a front basket, the Treadwell Neo 2 EQ is ready for weekend adventures and weekday commuting. With its low-profile Hyena drive unit giving your power a boost, this city-friendly e-bike smooths out the hills, and gets you from A-to-B, without feeling like you need some Zs. Stable geometry promotes an ergonomic, upright riding position. Big smooth rolling Maxxis tires have great grip on bike lanes and backroads. Integrated rack and fender mounts let you customize your new ride for any weather or job. And, the kickstand helps your e-bike stand tall when there are no racks in sight.

  • SmartForm C3 alloy frame and chromoly fork, with relaxed geometry
  • Lower top tube makes mounting and dismounting easier
  • Hyena Hydrive MRC-250 250W drive unit, with multiple levels of pedal assist
  • Max distance varies with conditions and assistance level; Cannondale quotes a maximum range of 75km
  • Bar-mounted HMI control unit makes it easy to turn your bike on and off and select the right level of assistance
  • Motor drive in the rear hub, with the battery concealed down tube
  • To keep your battery performing at its best, follow the manufacturer’s guidelines regarding storage and charging conditions (e-Bike batteries can be very sensitive to cold temperatures)
  • Integrated HERRMANS® front and rear lights help you see and be seen, and are powered by the bike’s battery, so you never need to worry about charging these bike lights
  • Part of Cannondale’s EQ (or equipped) line, this bike comes ready to roll with fenders, a rear rack, a front and rear light, reflective details, and a kickstand
  • Wide, ergonomic seat keeps your ride comfy
  • Tektro hydraulic disc brakes offer plenty of stopping power
  • 1x8 drive train pairs a 38T chain ring with an 11-34T cassette
  • Plush 47C Maxxis tires add a little extra cushion
  • Bikes are covered by MEC's Rocksolid Guarantee and Bike Service Agreement. You can bring your bike to any MEC Bike Shop for free adjustments and minor maintenance for two years after purchase
  • Due to challenges with supply chain, components may be substituted for comparable parts at any time. The listed build is how MEC intended your bike to arrive, though the manufacturer may need to make a tweak or two to get you riding sooner
name: Cannondale Treadwell Neo 2 EQ Remixte E-Bicycle - Unisex
